name: Virens
description:
🍃 Welcome to station Hortuxx-DC! 🍃

This intergalactic garden represents the latest advances in botanical science and agriculture!

Features:

  • Your very own space-sapling
  • Six interactive utilities
  • Station Head  providing advice and lore
  • Mellow auditory ambience & gobsmackingly green colors

🍃 A COMPO entry for Ludum Dare 52 🍃

Theme : Harvest

Made in 48 hours

🍃🍃🍃🍃

Input using mouse or touchscreen.

Mobile support!

🍃🍃🍃🍃
